about_the_game:
Keyboard Kommander is a zombie apocalypse typing game. Help our hero through five chapters of wanton zombie mayhem as you type the story of humanity’s fall. You can upload any text document and generate a campaign from it. Are your typing skills strong enough to help the Keyboard Kommander save the world?


Players will unlock the story of the Keyboard Kommander and the fall of civilization through five chapters of fast-paced typing action. The game features five different locations. The game also comes with Frankenstein and Dracula as playable campaigns. The game gains endless replay value through the ability for players to play through any text document they upload.


There are six different types of zombies, each with unique abilities. The Nurse zombie can heal its injured comrades. The Sprinter zombie is fast on its feet but has lower health than other zombies. The Rager zombie charges toward the fort when you make a typo. The Tank zombie has high health and shields nearby enemies. Finally, the Grub zombie can drain the health of other zombies and grow stronger as it consumes them.


The Laser is a heavy-hitting weapon that pierces multiple zombies in a line. The Mortar is an area-of-effect weapon that changes the battlefield. Finally, the Repulsor pushes zombies away and stunning them while also dealing some damage.


***Disclaimer***

Despite the nature of the story told in Keyboard Kommander we at Chunko Games, are in no way, 5G conspiracists - it was merely a fun premise for our narrative department to play with, creating an alternate universe that features zombie enemies. Any unfortunate parallels to conspiracy theories in our universe are, well, unfortunate and unintended, as this is a work of fiction, for the purpose of entertainment.

content_descriptors.notes: There are zombies that you shoot with weapons. There is no blood but there are explosions.

name: _keyboardkommander

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A true test of your typing skills, Keyboard Kommander is a fast-paced zombie type’em up, and the story of a conspiracy theorist vindicated. Type through five brutal chapters of gameplay to learn the fate of humanity through the eyes of its would-be savior. Need to kill that zombie? Use your words!
